name: Metal Cube Solid
description:
METAL CUBE SOLID

Solid Cube is has captured some important pieces of information, and now he must escape Capsule Base at the heart of Capsule Empire.

This information is too valuable if found, so the only thing Solid Cube can do is move ahead.

Will you help him find a way out?

Ver0.2, Mega Release Alpha includes 10 levels and 2 new enemies!

Project Roadmap:

More Maps!

A Story!

Add sound effects! (footsteps, ambient sounds, etc)

NPCs to talk to (Friendlies)

Other Map Objectives (capture the briefcase, talk to certain NPC, etc)

Have your PC attack other NPCs

Open to Suggestions!

Made with the tutorial help of https://sebastian.itch.io/

Thank you for Playing!
